mcbj.HoldTrace.calculate_avg_value_on_step¶

HoldTrace.calculate_avg_value_on_step(value_array: ndarray, in_ranges: ndarray) → ndarray¶

Calculate avg values for each step in the ranges: in_ranges

Parameters:
value_arraynp.ndarray

Array of the measured conductance or current.

in_rangesnp.ndarray

starting and ending point of each step, where avg value is calculated

Returns:
avg_valuesnp.ndarray

average values on each step

MCBJ STM-BJ
